trans-unit.source: Resolves localizable settings for classes and properties in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_baml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-baml-md.md)].

BamlLocalizabilityResolver is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizer> in order to resolve localizability settings for classes and properties in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)].
The resolver is called both at the time of resource extraction as well as when localized [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] is updated.

At the time of resource extraction (<xref:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizer.ExtractResources%2A>), the resolver: - Provides <xref:System.Windows.LocalizabilityAttribute> for classes and properties in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] when the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizer> is constructing localizable resources.
- Provides formatting preferences for elements in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] so elements are formatted as inline tags.

At the time at which localized [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] is updated (<xref:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizer.UpdateBaml%2A>), the resolver: - Resolves formatting tags back into classes.
- Resolves the name of the assembly that contains class definition.
- BamlLocalizabilityResolver is subclassed by an internal class that performs the practical aspects of the class functions for <xref:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizer>.
## XAML Text Usage
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizabilityResolver"></xref> class.
Returns a value that indicates whether a specified type of element can be localized and, if so, whether it can be formatted inline.
The full name of the assembly that contains [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] to be localized.
The full class name of the element that you want to retrieve localizability information for.
An object that contains the localizability information for the specified assembly and element.
Returns a value that indicates whether a specified property of a specified type of element can be localized.
The full name of the assembly that contains [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)] to be localized.
The full class name of the element that you want to retrieve localizability information for.
The name of the property that you want to retrieve localizability information for.
An object that specifies whether and how the property can be localized.
Returns the full name of the assembly that contains the specified class.
The full class name.
The full name of the assembly that contains the class.

Returns the full class name of a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] tag that has not been encountered in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_baml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-baml-md.md)].
This method is called when a <xref:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.BamlLocalizer> or an equivalent is applying substitutions to localizable resources.
If a formatting tag is encountered in the substitutions, this method is called to resolve the formatting tag back to a class name.
The name of the tag.
The full class name associated with the tag.
